welcome_header.text: Welcome to Xbox Live® Arcade's Hexic® HD!

welcome_body.text: Hexic HD, an addictive puzzler from the creator of Tetris®, is just one of the many great games available in Xbox Live Arcade on the Xbox 360™ platform. Xbox Live Arcade is a central destination for Xbox 360 gamers to find, download, try and buy smaller game titles directly on their consoles. Xbox Live Arcade is one of the main buttons on the Games Blade. You can jump straight into Xbox Live Arcade from the Xbox 360 Dashboard, where you can access and manage your game collection, check out new releases, download new games and experience cool around-the-game features. Every game in Xbox Live Arcade features a free, fully playable trial version that any Xbox Live Gold or Silver member can download to either their Hard Drive or Memory Unit.

welcome_footer.text: We hope you enjoy this free trial version of Hexic HD, and we hope to see you in the Arcade!
